title: Sign Up Not Working?
body: Hey, so I've been trying to set my sister up with an account for this game, but whenever I hit the sign up button it just says "Sign Up Failed" and nothing else. All the fields had the little checkmark, and the email wasn't in use already. Could someone please tell me what the problem is so I can sign her up, it's really frustrating not knowing what the problem is.

replies.body: Im sorry if im bringing up ad old disscussion but this problem is happening again now, ive tried everything, different email, name, loger name, birthdate changed lots of times, and still wont accept it. please I need help, Thanks in advance{{champion:64}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:1409}}

I am also having the same problem.

I'm trying to create a NA account for my wife but I keep getting the same "Your signup has failed" message. Ive tried a number of user names.
BrinleyKicks
BrinleyKicks0
0BrinleyKicks0
000BrinleyKicks000
Brinley00Kicks
None of them seem to work at all. Sometimes I am able to answer 1 or 2 captcha questions, sometimes I don't even get the chance to. Any help would be greatly appreciated, as she has been talking a lot of smack lately and I may begin to rethink my vows.
Thanks!

Usually, a sign up failure suggests that either an email is already in-use or the username is taken.  I know you mentioned that the email wasn't in use, but is she able to try another username or email that she has access to?  Let me know.

Can you please help us? =(( We cannot see our clubs.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ejHtoMiz-club-bug

Heya, that's a pretty old post and the club issues should now be resolved.  I took a look and do see some recent posts in it, so if you're still having an issue hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'd like to take a look at those cases individually to see what's going on.  We'll take care of you in that ticket!
That's strange!  Do you have a ticket number I can take a look at?  Let me know!
Thanks!  I see your ticket has been successfully received, and we'll reply back as soon as we can!
It said that the username was fine, and I tried two different emails that weren't used but it still said there was a problem.
The creation page isn't very specific and the username might actually be taken even if it says otherwise.  Let me know if trying a different username works.
Tried different usernames, still won't work. Just takes us to the page that says signup failed with nothing else on it telling what the problem is.
The age that was submitted may be under the requirements of the[ terms of use](http://www.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse).  Let me know if that may be the case.
Its working now, she put a few more numbers in her name and it went through. Thx for the help :)
